channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise
item.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available...

item.title: From Sex Appeal to the Far Right, Brigitte Bardot Symbolized a Changing France
item.description: In the decades after becoming a megastar, the French actress became as known for her politics as she once had been for her acting career.

item.title: Jeffrey R. Holland, next in line to lead Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, dies at 85
item.description: Jeffrey R. Holland led the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, a key governing body. He was next in line to become the church's president.

item.title: Zelensky to Meet With Trump at Mar-a-Lago About Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine brings a revised 20-point peace proposal, as well as doubts about whether Russia is serious about pursuing pea...

item.title: Zelenskyy to meet with Trump as efforts to end Russia-Ukraine war remain elusive
item.description: In the days before the meeting, Russia has intensified its attacks on Ukraine's capital, using missiles and drones to attack Kyiv and try to increase ...

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, sex goddess of cinema, has died
item.description: Legendary screen siren and animal rights activist Brigitte Bardot has died at age 91. The alluring former model starred in numerous movies, often play...

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, French Movie Icon Who Renounced Stardom, Dies at 91
item.description: “And God Created Woman” made her a world-famous sex symbol in the 1950s. She later gave up acting to devote her life to animal welfare.

item.title: For Ukrainians, a nuclear missile museum is a bitter reminder of what the country gave up
item.description: The Museum of Strategic Missile Forces tells the story of how Ukraine dismantled its nuclear weapons arsenal after independence in 1991. Today many Uk...

item.title: From A.I. to Chips, Big Tech Is Getting What It Wants From Trump
item.description: The president has backed policies that allow the industry to grow unfettered. The mutually beneficial alliance is causing concern among some conservat...

item.title: Zero Hour for the Middle East
item.description: After more than a decade of wars, from Syria to Gaza, the Middle East is exhausted by conflict. Is it ready to find another way?

item.title: What to Know About Colombia’s Role in the Global Drug Trade Amid Trump’s Feud With Petro
item.description: President Gustavo Petro is locked in a war of words with President Trump over Colombia’s major role in the global drug trade. The issue is complicated...

item.description: After more than a decade of wars, from Syria to Gaza, the Middle East is exhausted by conflict. Is it ready to find another way?

item.title: Twins’ Peaks: The Gilbertson Brothers Want to Rewrite Your Country’s Map
item.description: Two brothers, both mechanical engineers, are climbing many of the world’s tall peaks to prove they have been measured incorrectly.

item.title: Map: 6.6-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Taiwan
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.
